elements.title: Steven Woolfe seriously ill after altercation at Ukip meeting
elements.subtitle:
Sources say MEP, who is favourite for the party’s leadership, was punched and subsequently collapsed at the Strasbourg parliament

  • Ukip leadership candidate Steven Woolfe seriously ill – Politics live

elements.title: Brexit 'not good news for British science' warn new Nobel laureates
elements.subtitle: Duncan Haldane and Sir Fraser Stoddart call for scientists to be given protected status for visas, and highlight the role of EU funding in attracting elite scientists
